activities: We receive data concerning the ability of an individual to perform a work task as determined by that individual. It is essentially a self assessment that that they provide so that our application can create a personal development plan for that person.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: We receive name, email, job role within the organization, and region, all of which is manually supplied by the individual.
recoursemech: ommitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
